sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Avago Technologies ( AVGO ) topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 11.5%.
Year to date, Avago Technologies registers a 24.9% gain.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is Newfield Exploration ( NFX ), trading down 8.3%.
Newfield Exploration is showing a gain of 21.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Noble Corp ( NE ), trading down 5.3%, and Salesforce.com ( CRM ), trading up 11.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
